channel.title: Making admins thru a text document
channel.description: How do I make it where the admin,mod, staff list is just a simple text document instead of going through client.java? I know this can be done but I don't know the way.

item.title: Making admins thru a text document
item.dc:creator: @dovey dovey
item.description:
@dovey wrote:

search for start of in client.java and it will say admin when u press search three times then change (the righting of some1s name) to your then save. compile. runserver . login and you should be admin you might not see your self as admin though

hope i helped

Read full topic
item.source: Making admins thru a text document

item.description:
@Newbi wrote:

you have to go through the client.java…

I mean come on man its not that hard, all you do is type the persons name

item.title: Making admins thru a text document
item.dc:creator: @jammesz jammesz
item.description:
@jammesz wrote:

Yea that normally works but on TestScape the server just changes it back from 2 (or 3) to 0 and you cant edit anything on it.

Read full topic
item.source: Making admins thru a text document

item.title: Making admins thru a text document
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

the way u do it is u go to character files and go to ur name or the name u want to make a admin and u should see this

[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3251 character-posy = 3433 character-rights = 0 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = localhost character-lastlogin = 20061117 character-energy = 100 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 6764

where it says character rites = 0 put this 1 = mod 2 = admin 3 = owner

hope that helps

n0va

Read full topic
